title: Guided Breathing: Escape The Monkey Mind
description:
Don't do this breathwork in water or when driving.

🫁 Join my Breathwork Library & Academy to truly master the power of breath: https://kitarowaga.com/kitaros-breathwork-academy

✅ Weekly tips on breathwork and mindfulness: https://kitarowaga.com/#weekly-newsletter

🚀 Start with my free 15-day breathwork course: https://kitarowaga.kit.com/15-day-breathwork-course


A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a breathwork coach, Movement practitioner under Ido Portal, and traditional Kung Fu practitioner for 20 years. If you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel. 
--

channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/RgPmF7hptXY" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: 🧡 Support my work by subscribing to my Breathwork Library, and get access to a vast library of guided breathwork videos: https://academy.kitarowaga.com/checkout/breathwork-library

I didn't think you could make a more powerful and effective session but you did.  My new favorite.  Your sensory directions allowed me to hold further.  Can't yet go full distance, but getting closer.  Peace brother

Your videos gave my Wim Hof method breathing a new dimension.
Since i landed on your YouTube channel, my life truly has changed for the good.
Because of an accident i had a few years ago, i got aquired brain injury and with that comes 'uncontrollable' thoughts....
Now i got the control back, its unbelievable...
Thank you so so much!!
Thank you again for a beautiful morning to reset for another beginning.
